dashboard.employees.title: Employees
dashboard.employees.description:
Here you can manage your employees. You can add, edit and delete employees.
        You can also assign employees to companies. You can also see the list of employees and their companies.
dashboard.employees.empty: No employees found. Create new one, please.
dashboard.companies.empty: No companies found. Create new one, please.
dashboard.companies.title: Companies
dashboard.companies.description:
Here you can manage your companies. You can add, edit and delete companies.
         Also, you can see the list of companies and their employees. You can also assign employees to companies.
welcome.title: Admin App
